name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reopen Closed Tab with Command + Z / Ctrl + Z

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reopen closed tab with Command + Z, or Ctrl + Z on Windows. Will not conflict with the Undo function when in text editing field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
Safari-like function to reopen tab with Command + Z, or Ctrl + Z on Windows.

â˜… It WILL NOT conflict with the Undo function when you are in a text editing field, i.e., intelligently perform Undo instead of Reopen Tab.

Developed especially for the users who transfer from, and have got used to the intuitiveness of Safari. We also recommend all users experience this intuitive shortcut!

System Compatibility
Developed for all operation systems. Have been tested on macOS (Command + Z) and Windows (Ctrl + Z). 

Please feel free to report bug or give advice on our GitHub repo: https://github.com/YunfangHou/Safari-like-Tab-Reopener
